author: Wesley Wilmot
comment: Suddenly I have to pay again. Trash app anyway

author: Bobby Samelak-Pain
comment: Paid for the original version of guitar solo and now this one comes along and have to pay again for essentially the same functionality . Sorry but that's a kick in the teeth for those who purchased the original. Update - developer responded but not in a consumer centric manner. Won't be using the app that I previously purchased. Clearly there's not even an incentive to upgrade.

reply.author: Coding Caveman
reply.content: The original is still available on the Play Store for those who purchased it previously, just not for new customers.  If you don't need the new features, you can still install the old one without having to pay again.

title: Not really fair having to pay again

author: Johnny Popular
comment: Slow loading with every menu selection. Setting changes do not fix. From strum to sound, rhythm has lag. Not able to rotate or adjust to hold comfy grip. Samsung galaxy s3 worked better, please refund.
title: Got worse after purchase

author: Trevor
comment: It works great, I absolutely love this app. At one point I had a slight issue and I emailed the developer and he got back to me right away and helped fixed the problem!

author: shawn richardson
comment: I downloaded guitar solo. (Original app) It wasn't free either.  But I did a promotion to get full version. App has been updated a couple times and now the new version is $3 so I asked dev for help. Was told I didn't buy new version so I needed to download old version again.   So I went to find it.  Now it's $3 too. I asked dev for access to it again and was given sob story about taking money from his kids mouth and I should just buy it again.  Save your time and your money.  Uninstalling this garbage

reply.author: Coding Caveman
reply.content: You used Solo 1 free for years (you never paid a cent for more than 50 updates).  Solo 2 is a near complete rewrite,with many more features, but you expect it to still be free.  This is how I make a living, charging for something doesn't make it garbage.

title: Not a free app.  And customer service is terrible

author: Dennis Tomcanin
comment: got it on my lg g4 ONLY so i could use it in tandem with my samsung Gs2 watch,( that the add says is supported). tried to sync gear 2s watch to app and it said i now have to wait for it to come to samsung store....Im,bummed.
title: this is legal?

author: Gerry Campbell
comment: Same as old one with slightly updated UI and smart watch control. If you already have original Solo app , not really worth getting this one.
title: Meh

author: lalo lalouve
comment: Well… While this is one of the apps I'm glad to have and support, Solo 2 is a bit of a disappointment over Solo. There is still no easy way to load a chord/lyrics set, one has to use the unreadable overlay. The audio engine that sort of works has a noticeable delay between touching the string and the sound, and it sadly does not and likely will not support Pebble. So, while there are some improvements over 1, it is not exactly a wow product for me.

author: Paul Venturi
comment: I paid for the full version and it won't let me as another row to the chords section says only available in the full version which i paid for
title: Not recognizing the full version

comment: I hate it and guess what can't believe it that's a stupid update on it and now you can't delete games so I hate this stupid game it does not work it sounds like you're playing a piano not a guitar this sucks this is the worst ever in the history so whoever created this game you can fix the whole game it doesn't even sound like that sorry cuz I could play guitar so stupid people fix it and maybe I'll get it back if I could delete I get to do with it I don't even know who won the points that are on the tablet on the phone or their watch stupid idiot I hate you bye
title: This is so stupid

comment: Thank u soooooooooo much..I love misic , but I don't have any instruments... Now I can play with this app..thanks a lot..god helps u more..

comment: Amazing solo guitar but can you please refine the ui because ui is out dated and ugly
title: Amazing sound

author: Ray Ellis
comment: Please add heavy metal guitar! Would be awsome to play some Metallica!
title: Awsome app! Would give 5 stars but lacks guitar styles.

author: Brittany Schwarz
comment: In order to use my watch I had to buy premium, but it's pointless. Sucked to begin with then it stopped working all together after 5 minutes! Now to figure out how to get a refund! Waste of money. Grr.
title: Paid for something that doesn't work!

author: Anthony Montoya
comment: Paid for full version to use my watch and get rid of annoying ads... Doesn't connect to watch and still has annoying ads

author: JJ Bou
comment: App seems good, but already paid and am being instructed to pay again. I am trying to load this on more than one device to run without ads.  I am using it under the same account.

reply.author: Coding Caveman
reply.content: If you use the same Google Account on all your devices, it should be unlocked on all if you've purchased it once.  Email me and I'll troubleshoot this with you.

title: Instructed to repay for premium

author: David Nassau
comment: After fooling around with it for several minutes, I couldn't get it to anything useful. Baffling and unintuitive.

comment: I can't find the download for my gear 2 watch anywhere! I looked in the galaxy apps on my galaxy note 5. And also the gear apps. Any idea where the Samsung download is?
title: Good app

comment: The strums have got a serious defect... strumming only when they want to... useless

comment: I downloaded as part of "free" app for Gear smart watch and discovered it was not actually free when it told me I needed to buy the ability to connect to my watch.  Uninstalling both phone and watch app.

author: Vynne
comment: So far its great,but how can i find the vibration setting,its kinda bothering

reply.author: Coding Caveman
reply.content: In the app menu (three dots top right) there is a Settings item.  Open this and you'll find options to disable vibrations.
